text:
Hotel Montana premier Senggigi, Hotel yang keren.

Keren untuk arsitektur bangunannya. Atmosfirnya bikin nyaman. Setiap spot disini sangat Instagrammable. Dan yang paling bikin betah stay di Hotel ini adalah keramahan setiap Asociatenya.

Saya baru pertama kali nginap di Hotel ini dan menurut saya service yang diberikan sangat memuaskan..
The give their Best...
Very good Hotel with Best Hospitality...

Terimakasih banyak untuk setiap senyum manis dari setiap Asociate yang selalu menyapa saya ketika saya melewati Lobby Hotel maupun ketika saya sedang Breakfast / Lunch di Restauran.

Special Thanks buat Tim yang sudah memberikan saya Surprise pada saat ulang tahun saya tanggal 10 Juni yang lalu.. 

Terimakasih banyak buat Mbak Hasna dan Team yang selalu Ramah, Hamble dan sangat membantu.

Mbak Hasna, Mas Lalu Halim serta mbak yang bantuin pada saat Check in (maaf saya ngak notice namanya) They are very Amazing person.  They have very good Attitude Hospitality 👍👍
Serius mereka sangat Luar biasa.
Service yang diberikan bener bener dari hati dan nyampe. Sebagai orang yang paham tentang dunia perhotelan saya bisa merasakan..👍👍

Overall Hotel ini sangat Recommended buat wisatawan yang berwisata ke pulau Lombok..
Dijamin ngak bakal kecewa.👍👍

Finally Thank you very much for your Great Hospitality...

From your Guest

Jefrhy
#302.
title: Good Hotel with Best Hospitality ❤️

text: Menginap disini karena menjadi salah satu hotel pilihan paket tour. Disambut dengan ramah oleh resepsionis, dan banyak dibantu oleh staf2 disini karena kebetulan, ada rombongan saya yang berulang tahun. Jadi sebelumnya saya request pesan birthday cake dan dilayani dengan ramah via wa oleh kak Tyas.. karena menginap agak lama, jadi sempat bertemu oleh beberapa staff di Front Office, salah satunya adalah Kak Teguh yang selalu menyapa dengan ramah. Juga staff2 di bagian sarapan, menu sarapan bervariasi, jadi meski menginap 5 hari, tetap terasa enak sewaktu sarapan. Ukuran kamar standard, hanya saja begitu ditambah extra bed langsung terasa sempit. Namun air panas lancar, ac juga berfungsi dengan baik. Kebetulan juga dapat kamar yang ada balkonnya jadi bisa menjemur pakaian. Pokoknya puas, lagian menginap hanya untuk tidur saja. Namun di hotel ini bisa beristirahat dengan enak. Hotel ini ada kolam renangnya juga lho. Next time bakal nginep di hotel ini lagi karena lokasinya juga bagus, dekat toko2 alfamart, kfc dan cafe2.
title: Staff ramah banget, lokasi juga bagus

text: Hati2 menginap di sini, kaos oleh2 anak saya raib. Pada saat saya mau cek out tgl 31 des, saya ketemu dengan managernya, katanya mau kirim rekaman CCTV-nya lewat email. Sampai hari ini tgl 4 januari. Tidak ada email yg saya terima. Sy td pagi tlp, yg terima mbak ayu, katanya managernya mau tlp 10 menit lagi, sy tunggu sampai jam 10.30 tidak ada yg tlp jg. Akhirnya saya yg tlp lagi, yg terima kalau tdk salah namanya radit, sy suruh tunggu lagi, katanya managernya mau tlp, saya tunggu sampai jam 13.00. Tidak ada yg tlp. Saya lagi yg tlp. Yg terima mbak ayu lagi. Katanya suruh tunggu lagi. Sy minta bicara sekarang. Dr pagi, saya hanya diminta menunggu, akhirnya saya dikasih nomor tlp sales bukan managernya, atas nama lia. Baru lia bilang rekaman CCTV dikirim melalui email. Jika saya tidak di tlp ???  Gak akan dikirim rekaman CCTV nya. Tp ini sdh 3 jam, tetep aja, tdk ada email masuk. Maksudnya apa ya? Berbohong terus. Dr manager, receptionist, house keeping, sales semuanya pembohong Pikir ulang deh, kalau mau menginap di PREMIER MONTANA Senggigi. Maunya gak kasih bintang, tp gak ada pilihan tanpa bintang. Kalau mau bukti tlp dan chat dengan yg terhormat Ibu Lia, bisa contact saya. Ada bukti2nya semua. Sampai detik ini saya mengirim ulasan jam 18.51, tidak ada email yg masuk.

text:
Aku kasi ulasan ya..

LOCATION sangat strategis, memang sih ngga langsung di pinggir pantai, tapi jarak ke pantai cuman 100 m jalan kaki. Kalau nginep di junior suite, bisa langsung dapat view ke arah pantai. 

HOSPITALITY hotel ini bagus, satpam, Reception dan office boy udah jalanin SOP 3S, senyum-salam-sapa.

BUILDING bagus lantai 7, disain minimalis terkesan mewah, interior loby modern dgn nuansa woody. Duduk di area Lobby terasa nyaman.

ROOM saya di kamar 606 superior, kamar terasa kurang luas untuk berdua. AC OK, kamar bersih, kasur dan bantal empuk, standar hotel berbintang. Disain minimalis, nuansa warna black white, tapi kombinasi enak. Sayangnya chanel TV yg aktif hanya 19 chanel. View ke luar jendela dan depan pintu lumayan bagus.

BATHROOM semua berfungsi, shower dan toilet, air panas semua OK.

Wi-Fi ada di semua area, tapi speed standar jaringan lokal. Kalau biasa ke LN, terus internetan, jangan dibandingin deh. Tapi di Lombok ya standard begini. Kalau untuk menghemat pulsa/paket ya lumayan lah.

Breakfast, krn gw dateng pasca gempa, ngga bisa ngelihat breakfast yg biasanya. Cuma dapet nasi goreng. Tp kata reception biasanya sih komplit.

Kolam Renang, airnya bening banget, terawat, tapi rasanya sih kurang luas. Lima kali ayun gaya bebas, mentok. 

Menu restauran lumayan komplit, fushion, western, dan lokal. Kalau malem minggu ada life music dan barbeque murah. Gw coba bbrp menu, rasanya pas di lidah. Enakk.. 

Overall, hotel ini recomended untuk meeting, bisnis atau wisata di Lombok. Terutama bagi yg ingin menikmati suasana pantai di kawasan Senggigi yang legendaris.
title: Very nice accomodation at Senggigi

text: i stayed at this hotel for a month in July 2019. The hotel is listed as a 3 star hotel but felt much more like a 4 star. The pool area is a great place to relax for a couple of hours in the sun and the drinks and food are reasonabley priced and very tasty. The staff are amazing, always happy and eager to please, they treat you like family. I became good friends with the Porter Rian who showed me all over the island on his days off and took me to many places that tourists dont see, he is a star and definitely approach him with any questions on where to go. The owner and The Head Chef Jay are absolute diamonds and allowed me to spend 2 hours in the Hotels Kitchen to cook some home food because I was home sick, nebver have I known a hotel to allow this. But going above and beyond perfectly describes this Hotel. After 4 weeks of looking at the 4 star resort next door I decided to book in to Aruna Senggigi for a week.... The worst decision I made in the 6 weeks I spent in Lombok, this 3 star hotel is much better and i guarentee you will have a better experience here.
title: Clean hotel, lovely pool, AMAZING food, Happy Friendly Staff and central location

owner_response.text:
Dear Mohaidi Rami ,

We thank you for staying Montana Premier Senggigi. Your feedback is appreciated as we notice you also very happy with the quality of Hotel rooms , delicious foods and other discounted price we had given during  dinner . Our review so far, when guests broke the hotel amenities such as glass and found it was OK to pay the affordable price to compensate it, as the guests understand every stuffs has it own specification with the cost incurred during procurement process. Our Team also never done this kind of issue to do  corruption as the cost to pay back is set by the Management . Thus, the comparison is not in similarity and the price to pay back is very cheap . We thank you very much for your feedback and hope you have a better understanding on the policy of each Hotel and see you again in Lombok

text: I came with colleagues to Lombok to enjoy Senggigi, Mataram, and Gili Trawangan. A nice hotel with a pretty decent facilities. The hotel is not next to a beach, but to access Senggigi beach, you just need to cross the front street. So, it's still a plus. Clean bedrooms, friendly staffs. Since we came when Covid still left its effect, we couldn't have a fully served breakfast buffet. Instead, we were offered three choices (American breakfast plate, Soto, or fried rice) along with some hot tea, coffee and a sereal option. I had an American breakfast platter and everything was good except that one too dry sausage. Didn't spent much in the hotel, and didn't try its pool. But it seems clean and the size is not so big.
title: Comfy stay near the Senggigi Beach

text:
We stayed at the Montana for the new year period, and paid what we thought to be a very fair rate for our rooms, which included a buffet breakfast. The Montana looks to be pretty new; I'd estimate it be only about 3 years old. So the rooms still felt fresh, despite the somewhat 'budget' standard (no safe, no fridge, no closet, no balcony). The friendly staff were always ready to help, though their English was well below the standard you'd find at hotels on nearby Bali (this isn't a complaint, more an observation; some people want to deal with English-speaking staff, and base their decision on where to stay on that. Some-like me-accept that you're in a country where English is very much a secondary language). 

The pool was small but clean and very refreshing after a day of walking around, and the pool area was a nice place to sit with an evening cocktail. The buffet breakfast was the only disappointment; the choice was very limited, and despite it being apparently served until 10am, we got there at 9.20am on our first morning and found that half the food on offer had been finished. When we asked staff for the dishes to be replenished, they simply told us that particular food item was finished. So you either get down there before 9am, or you settle for whatever gets left by the early bird guests.
title: Decent budget hotel that punches above its weight

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Warmest Greeting From Montana Premier Senggigi,

Thank you for taking your time to provide us review of your recent stay at Montana Premier Senggigi. It's a pleasure to serve you during your stay and we wish you have a memorable stay with us.

Please accept our sincerest apology regarding some issues you have had during your stay which caused you uncomfortable. We noted every highlight on your review and I will be more than happy to share this to all my team on management level as a wake up call to improve ourselves and make sure that your experience won't happen again in the future to other guest.

I hugely hope that we will have another opportunity to welcoming you back in the future and therefore we can redeem ourselves. However, we highly appreciated your positive feedback to some of our facilities and also to our friendly staff which I am very proud of. Again, we terribly apologize for the inconvenient caused and let me assure you that we will take care every details from your feedback and will improve ourselves to deliver the best service to our customers

text:
I went to Senggigi with my girlfriend for 3 nights at Montana Premier Hotel. 
We were not sure if we should go to sich a big hotel, because often it is just to crowded and the service is lacking.
But I am so happy we went there!

The hotel is very new and completely clean. The whole interiour is of very high standards, the staff is super friendly and perfectly educated in their business and there is always someone around to help you if needed (e.g. scooter bookings etc.).

The pool and lobby area is also super comfy, WiFi works perfectly good (go around 50.000 mbit), food was fabulous...

I could go on for ages, but the stay was just  perfect. Felt like at a super high standard hotel, but more familiar and for such a crazy good prize!

We would go there again at any time!

We stopped at Montana Premier Senggigi overnight on our way to the Gili Islands. Staff at reception/ front office very nice and helpful. Special thanks to Ayu A who arranged for a private car to meet us at the airport (our flight arrived around midnight) and transport us to the hotel. Cost was 325,000 IDR.

Easy check in. Large, modern and clean room. Very nice bathroom.  We stayed in room 608 which has an ocean view. See photo of view from room. Balcony doors are locked but not sealed so there is some traffic noise (we slept with ear plugs). See photo taken of road from hotel corridor.

We enjoyed the breakfast buffet, which was tasty and offered both Western and Indonesian food. The breakfast room is a lovely setting adjacent to the pool.

The hotel is central. We followed directions from hotel staff to find a small shop on the main street (which the hotel is also on) where we could buy Indonesian SIM cards for our phone (it had the word Mitra at the top). The woman there helpful.  She registered the SIM cards for us.
There are also plenty of ATMs near the hotel.

When we checked out, we asked the staff to call us a Bluebird taxi. They use meters. It cost 110,000 IDR for the taxi trip from the hotel to Bangsa Harbour. From there we bought a ticket directly from the ticket office (ignore all touts and buy direct from office) for the public boat for 15,000 IDR to transport is to Gili Trawangan.

We certainly would not hesitate to stay at Montana Premier Senggigi again when we next visit the Gili islands.
title: Excellent value for money

The design of the hotel would have better with the non sea view rooms facing the town and volcano, rather than the vacant lots next to it, so Def try get a sea view room with balcony. The breakfasts are good and excellently presented. I found the first two mornings staff were banging in the he doors of the adjacent rooms for over an hour starting at 6h30am which woke me up early twice, but in the 3rd day they didn't.  Overall, I can recommend it for a good stay in Senggigi.

text: Core hotel was a nice stay. Centrally located, you could walk almost anywhere that is worthwhile in Senggigi. Staff were particularly friendly and helpful...shout out to my man Zamroni, he made my life so easy...cheers Zamroni!!! Anyone who is wanting to stay at this place as a transfer hotel before heading to Gili Islands, it should only cost around $8AUD for a taxi to the port - about a 30min drive. This area is also good as a hub to come back to after day trips exploring the north western region of Lombok. Only average thing about this place was the breakfast, but that really didnt matter as you can get a decent breaky walking just down the road. All up, i would recommend this place as a great place to stay!
title: Excellent value for money

text:
スンギギの入口にあるホテルで地球の歩き方にも紹介されています。
中心部へは徒歩圏内で近くには、レストラン、ワルン、バー、トラベルデスク、マッサージ、ランドリーサービス、屋台、レンタルバイクなど何でもあります。
お値段のわりにサービスもよく、お部屋は少し狭いですがもコンパクトにまとめられて使いやすいです。
朝食もオムレツなどの卵料理が美味しくなかなかgood！
気のいいスタッフもいます。
エレベーターは2機、ストレスないです。
空港送迎も良心的な価格でした。

このホテルを拠点にギリメノに2泊しました。
ホテルからバンサル港までブルーバードタクシーで30分強、バンサル港ではくれぐれも正規のボートチケット売り場(画像アップあり)でチケットを購入してください。
帰路でバンサル港に着いたら、客引きは無視して10分くらい歩くとブルーバードタクシーの基地がありますのでそこから乗ること！
そうしないとボートも車も法外な値段となりますよ！
title: コンパクトにまとめられた便利なホテル

text:
Struttura raggiungibile a piedi dal centro e le due spiagge vicino a sanggigi, vicino al tempio. Buona colazione. Pulizia ottima e buon servizio. Piscina piacevole.
Personale gentile e cortese. Buon posto per passare qualche giorno. Sopra la media dei posti provati in Indonesia
title: Ottima struttura

text:
Belle hôtel à Sengiggi à 5mn de la plage à pied. Très bien situé. Très belle piscine extérieur,bon petit déjeuner en buffet à volonté halal avec pas mal de choix. Chambre bien harmonisé et propre. Staff très serviable et sympathique. Ne pas hésiter à leur demander des informations et de l'aide. Merci beaucoup à Zomrani et Reno. Vraiment satisfait. 
Thank you !!!
title: Très bien !!!

text: 酒店剛落成，員工很盡責，但有部分不懂英文較難溝通。客房不大，但整體清潔舒適，適合短暫住宿，酒店設有泳池但水很冷，喝杯pool side drink還是不錯。酒店有一杯welcome drink給我們，但味道不太好，只是一小杯香茅糖水，而且不少人在大堂酒吧抽煙。最令人驚喜的是早餐，自助餐選擇很多，更有即煮奄列，味道不錯。位置在聖吉吉的街尾，附近較少商店，但有KFC、街邊排檔和便利店。
title: 新快捷型酒店

text: Tolles Hotel, das vielen Ansprüchen gerecht wird. Insgesamt macht es einen sauberen und professionellen Eindruck. Das Sushi im Hotel ist übrigens sehr zu empfehlen. Bemängelt werden könnte allenfalls, dass auf dem Bettbezug Flecken bzw Schattierungen zu sehen waren und das Personal mitunter eher geringe Englischkenntnisse, aber sehr freundlich ist. Bei einem Checkout bevor es Frühstück gibt, wurde uns eine Essensbox mitgegeben. Insgesamt können wir das Hotel absolut empfehlen.
title: Tolles Hotel

text: Sind kurzfristig von einem Bungalow ins CoreHotel umgezogen, was äußerst unproblematisch und super schnell in die Wege geleitet wurde. Leckeren Willkommenssaft bekommem und ein reichhaltiges und leckeres Frühstück vorgefunden. Die Zimmer sind sehr modern und vor allem sauber. Ebenso die Mitarbeiter überzeugen mit ihrer hilfsbereiten und freundlichen Art. Hatten einen Klasse Aufenthalt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
title: Klasse Hotel

text: Een genot om hier te logeren. Alles klopt. Hotel is pas in Maart 2018 geopend. De kamer ziet er netjes en opgeruimd op. Handdoeken voor op het strand regel je zo bij Zamroni en zijn collega's bij de balie. Een topper. De locatie is centraal gelegen en steek je over ben je op het strand met de vele eetgelegenheden. Het restaurant en de bar zijn ook uitstekend. De chef heeft ons getrakteerd op een originele Javaans gerecht. Top.
title: Wat een SERVICE.
